tha-ap268:0.3_0: are stingy, with senior mendicants, hard works,
tha-ap268:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
tha-ap268:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap268:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap268:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Senior.
